byline.original: By ALAN FEUER and ANDREW HIGGINS

abstract: Many white ethnocentrists, nationalists and populists around world have come to view Russian Pres Vladimir Putin as symbol of their particular brand of Western values; see Putin as model of strength, racial purity and Christian faith in world under threat from Islam, immigrants and rootless cosmopolitan elites; Pres-elect Donald Trump's admiration for Putin may be calculated appeal to such groups.
lead_paragraph: In retrospect, Donald J. Trump’s praise for Russia’s president seems to have been a shrewd dog whistle to a small but highly motivated part of the Trump base.
snippet: In retrospect, Donald J. Trump’s praise for Russia’s president seems to have been a shrewd dog whistle to a small but highly motivated part of the Trump base....

headline.main: Extremists Turn to a Leader to Protect Western Values: Vladimir Putin
headline.print_headline: Extremists Turn to One Leader to Protect West’s Values: Putin
